alert.note: Alert for Yukon Flats and Surrounding Uplands (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued July 24 at 8:42PM AKDT until July 26 at 4:00AM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM TUESDAY TO 4 AM AKDT WEDNESDAY FOR LIGHTNING FOR YUKON FLATS AND SURROUNDING UPLANDS... ...RED FLAG WARNING IS CANCELLED FOR LIGHTNING FOR YUKON FLATS AND SURROUNDING UPLANDS... The National Weather Service in Fairbanks has cancelled the Red Flag Warning. * AFFECTED AREA...Yukon Flats and Surrounding Uplands. * TIMING...From 1 PM Tuesday to 4 AM AKDT Wednesday. * LIGHTNING ACTIVITY LEVEL...4. * WINDS...East 5 to 10 mph. * HUMIDITY...As low as 31 percent. * TEMPERATURES...In the mid 70s. * IMPACTS...Lightning from scattered thunderstorms today and tomorrow Tuesday could lead to new fire starts.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that conditions are occurring or will occur which could lead to the development of large and dangerous fires. It is directed toward fire agencies, and through them, to the public. Please advise the appropriate officials or fire crews in the field of this Red Flag Warning.
